/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the city's daily life. The intersection is teeming with vehicles, including cars and trucks, all moving in harmony under the clear blue sky. Power lines crisscross above, forming a complex web against the backdrop of the sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the roads, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the hustle and bustle of city life.
